tasks.name: Resting Functional Connectivity
tasks.definition: Examining the correlations of the BOLD timeseries between the fusiform gyrus (FG) and the posterior superior temporal sulcus (pSTS) during periods of rest when no faces are present.
conditions: Resting state with no external face stimuli
Partial functional connectivity approach removing variance from the FG shared with other category-selective and control regions
contrasts: Overlap of FG-pSTS resting correlations with face-selective pSTS region from independent localizer runs
